name: MarsBase
description:
Year 2048 A.D.

Finally, Earth Space Alliance made a breakthrew with launching orbital base to Mars.  It was named MARS ONE.
Year 2061 A.D.
ESA send several modules to improve base operations, but due to a huge solar flare,  computer of the base was damaged. 
ESA needs YOU, the 1st captan of MARS ONE station to save priceles modules and the whole station.
